question:
Consider the following statements about the Padma Awards Committee:
  1. The committee is constituted every five years by the Parliament
  2. Prime Minister is the chairperson of the committee
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. The Padma Award Committee is constituted by the Prime Minister and not by Parliament. Also, it is constituted every year and not five years. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. Cabinet secretary is the chairperson of the committee and not Prime Minister. The Padma Awards Committee scrutinizes all nominations and submits its recommendations personal statement after due verification of the credentials to the Home Minister, Prime Minister and the President for approval.
